translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.
translation.it: Questo fa di te un eroe.

translation.en: Did you see how scared Scooby was when that car started moving? [laughing]
translation.it: Hai visto quanto si è spaventato Scooby quando quell'auto si è mossa?

translation.en: -With his ping-pong paddle at the ready! -Oh, my God!
translation.it: - Con la racchetta da ping-pong pronta! - Oddio!

translation.en: What a buffoon!
[mocking Hubie's voice] Mr. Hennessy! Mr. Hennessy!
There's somebody in the road.
-Who the hell is that? -It's not moving.
translation.it: Chi diavolo è? Non si muove.

translation.en: Looks like a dummy.
You look like a dummy. Go out and get it out of the way.
translation.it: Tu sembri un manichino. Scendi e spostalo.

translation.en: Okay.
Now, see, that does it for me.
You like that?
Scarecrow?
I'm gonna kick your ass for this, Lester.
translation.it: Ti prendo a calci in culo, Lester.

translation.en: I swear to God, if you jump out of one of these bushes,
translation.it: Giuro che se sbuchi da uno di questi cespugli,

translation.en: I'm gonna punch you in the face!
translation.it: ti do un cazzotto in faccia!

translation.en: What the--
Where are you?
[Hubie] Valentine family, where are you?
I'm coming!
I say, "Marco." You say, "Polo." Marco!
[man 1] Weirdo!
[man 2] Asshole!
Hubie Dubois! Is that you?
[Walter] Oh! You must be Mrs. Dubois!
I'm Walter!
Nice to meet you, Walter.
It's a shame what they've done to your lawn!
translation.it: È una vergogna ciò che hanno fatto al prato!

translation.en: Happens every year!
Not tonight!
We need to talk.
[Tommy] They're not up here.
[Megan] They're not down here, either.
-We didn't find them. -Hey! It's okay. We'll figure it out.
translation.it: - Non ci sono. - Tranquillo. Ne verremo a capo.

translation.en: -We'll find them. -[pounding at door]
What are we screaming at?
-Bam. -Mr. Dubois, I screwed up.
-I can't find my sisters. -You don't know where the kids are? Huh.
translation.it: - Non trovo le mie sorelle. - Non sai dove sono?

translation.en: 'Cause I do. They're right here.
-[girls] Tommy! Tommy! -Oh, my God!
I'm so sorry I left guys. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.it: Scusate se vi ho lasciate. Fortuna che state bene.

translation.en: You are so cute with them.
You have a girlfriend?
I saw 'em coming through the Old McMillan shortcut.
translation.it: Venivano dalla scorciatoia di Old McMillan.

translation.en: It was funny, 'cause not many people know where that shortcut is.
translation.it: È buffo, perché pochi sanno dove sia.

translation.en: Just me and a friend of mine, Richie Hartman. When I was a kid,
translation.it: Solo io e un mio amico, Richie Hartman. Da piccolo,

translation.en: we used to finish our band practice and shoot right through there.
translation.it: finivamo di suonare con la band e passavamo da lì.

translation.en: -Well, at least everybody's safe. -No one in Salem is safe tonight.
translation.it: - Almeno sono tutti al sicuro. - Nessuno lo è stasera.

translation.en: Do you understand me, Tommy? That's why I'm putting this family on lockdown.
translation.it: Capisci, Tommy? Per questo vi metto in isolamento.

translation.en: Now, Tommy, you call your mother. Let her know you're home.
translation.it: Tommy, chiama tua madre. Dille che siete a casa.

translation.en: Megan, you call your parents.
Let them know you're staying at a friend's. That's for you.
translation.it: Digli che stai da un amico. È per te.

translation.en: You two, do me a favor. Eat all the candy you want, and then go straight to sleep.
translation.it: Voi due, fatemi un favore. Mangiate le caramelle e poi a letto.

translation.en: And lock this door! No matter what, don't answer it!
translation.it: E chiudete la porta a chiave! Non rispondete in nessun caso!

translation.en: What're you gonna do, Mr. Dubois?
I'm gonna do what I do every October 31st.
Make sure every citizen in this town is safe and protected.
translation.it: Assicurarmi che tutti gli abitanti di questa città siano al sicuro.

translation.en: Um, but do you have a bathroom I could use? 'Cause I, uh…
translation.it: Ma avete un bagno che potrei usare? Perché…

translation.en: The soup kinda went right through me.
Upstairs.
Toilet? Is it a big toilet?
'Cause I got a lot to do.
I know that howl.
The transformation is complete.
While I understand that you are now a mindless killing machine,
translation.it: Capisco che ora sei una macchina assassina senza cervello,

translation.en: I would like to speak with the human being that is deep down below your fur.
translation.it: ma vorrei parlare con l'essere umano che si nasconde sotto quella pelliccia.

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
I cannot, in good faith, allow you to hurt another soul tonight,
translation.it: Non posso permetterle di far del male ad altre anime stasera,

translation.en: even though this is Halloween, and even though I know this is--
translation.it: anche se siamo a Halloween e anche se so che è…

translation.en: Mr. Lambert, you're better than that.
translation.it: Sig. Lambert, lei è meglio di così.

translation.en: You-- Did you really wanna defecate in front of me, sir?
translation.it: Lei… Davvero ha voluto defecare davanti a me?

translation.en: Oh, now, you're eating it!
Is that Michael Mundi you're eating right now?
translation.it: È Michael Mundi che sta mangiando?

translation.en: Is he inside your feces?
-[barking] -Mr. Lambert! Get over here!
[Hubie's voice] The only way to slay the beast is a silver bullet right between the eyes.
translation.it: L'unico modo per uccidere la bestia è un proiettile d'argento tra gli occhi.

translation.en: Yo, dawg! That's my bullet!
Mr. Lambert?
Mr. Lambert.
Mr. Lambert?
Mr. Lambert.
Mr. Lambert.
This is not your fault!
You are cursed!
Hello.
Mommy! No! Help me, Mommy!
Help me! Help me!
-[man] And stay out! -[women laughing]
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
That was so terrifying!
-That was even crazier than last year! -Yes!
translation.it: - Ancora più folle dell'anno scorso! - Sì!

translation.en: -How much fun was that? -That was so much fun. [laughing]
It almost made me forget that I buried my father today.
translation.it: Mi ha quasi fatto scordare che oggi ho sepolto mio padre.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
No, it's a good thing. I mean, not for him so much,
translation.it: No, è una buona cosa. Cioè, per lui non tanto,

translation.en: but it's given me time to be introspective.
translation.it: ma mi ha dato modo di essere introspettivo.

translation.en: -That's good. -I'm Pete Landolfa.
Oh, I'm Chantal.
-Chantal? -Yeah.
Come to me.
Walter. Come!
Here, Walter.
I don't wanna do this.
You've been a very good neighbor to me.
translation.it: Sei stato un buon vicino per me.

translation.en: But what has to be done, has to be done.
Right between…
the eyes!
-[dog barks] -No!
Homeboy. Are you okay, man?
-Dude. -No!
This is not real. You get that, right?
translation.it: Questo non è reale. Lo capisci, vero?

translation.en: We're just trying to raise money for our school.
translation.it: È solo per raccogliere fondi per la scuola.

translation.en: Wait a second.
-Are you hittin' on me? -[laughing]
Because if so, that is incredibly sick.
translation.it: Perché se è così, è disgustoso.

translation.en: We're having a conversation.
Mm-mmm. 'Cause you're, like, three times my age, okay?
translation.it: Perché hai tre volte la mia età, ok?

translation.en: Thrice. I was born around the same time you had your first heart bypass.
translation.it: Tre volte. Sono nata più o meno quando ti hanno messo il primo bypass.

translation.en: -[dog barks] -Oh, Buster! Hey, my big boy.
Are you here to protect me from this weirdo man that's trying to hit on me?
translation.it: Sei qui per proteggermi da questo svitato che ci prova?

translation.en: [screaming] My eyes are on fire!
-Why would you mace me? -Yo.
I'm a dentist. I help people!
translation.it: Sono un dentista. Aiuto la gente!

translation.en: Liar! Lucifer!
[laughing] That sounds like Hubie Dubois.
translation.it: Sembra la voce di Hubie Dubois.

translation.en: And since I struck out with you, I'm gonna take it out on him.
translation.it: E dato che mi è andata male con te, mi rifarò con lui.

translation.en: Have fun with that.
You gotta be-- Whoa. [chuckles]
There's this goof headed his way. Hubie Dubois.
translation.it: C'è uno svitato che sta venendo qua. Hubie Dubois.

translation.en: When he gets here, I'll handle the scaring.
translation.it: Quando arriva, ci penso io a fargli paura.

translation.en: You just sit back and enjoy. [snickers]
[Hubie] Attention, haunted house patrons.
This is a direct order from the AUU.
translation.it: Questo è un ordine diretto dell'UAI.

translation.en: Move quickly and quietly toward the exits.
translation.it: Avanzate velocemente e in silenzio verso le uscite.

translation.en: The man-wolf has eaten his kryptonite!
translation.it: Il licantropo ha mangiato la criptonite!

translation.en: Oh, my God. This is a travesty.
translation.it: Oddio. Ma questa è una farsa.

translation.en: First, Mike Mundi. Now, Mr. Landolfa.
translation.it: Prima, Mike Mundi. Ora, il sig. Landolfa.

translation.en: And why would God do this to such good people?
translation.it: Perché Dio farebbe questo a persone così buone?

translation.en: Good people? All those two ever did was abuse you, man.
translation.it: Persone buone? Quei due ti hanno sempre molestato.

translation.en: You know who should feel bad right now? Our wonderful mayor.
translation.it: Sapete chi dovrebbe sentirsi in colpa? Il nostro bravo sindaco.

translation.en: I'm truly sorry.
You knew that high school kid from the corn maze was missing.
translation.it: Sapeva che quel liceale era scomparso.

translation.en: -But you told nobody. -Yeah. Bad for business, I guess.
translation.it: - Ma non l'ha detto a nessuno. - Questione di soldi?

translation.en: Oh, they just found Lester Hennessy's car abandoned in the middle of Whipstick Road.
translation.it: Hanno trovato l'auto di Lester Hennessy abbandonata in mezzo a Whipstick Road.

translation.en: -No sign of Lester or Mary. -No!
translation.it: - Non c'è traccia di Lester, né Mary. - No!

translation.en: So, we are cancelin' the fireworks
and all other related Halloween activities.
translation.it: e tutte le altre attività di Halloween.

translation.en: -Officer Steve. -Not now, Hubie.
-I think I know who did it. -Oh, so do I.
translation.it: - Credo di sapere chi è stato. - Oh, anch'io.

translation.en: His name…
is Walter Lambert.
-Walter who? -Lambert.
Scientists would call him a lyco-thorpe.
translation.it: Gli scienziati lo chiamerebbero un lico-tropo.

translation.en: I think he means a lycanthrope.
-Is that what it is? -It's a werewolf.
-Okay. -Hubie, I will lock you up.
-I got four people missing here. -Officer Steve, listen to me.
translation.it: - Sono sparite quattro persone. - Agente, mi ascolti.

translation.en: I saw the man destroy his home earlier today.
translation.it: L'ho visto distruggere la sua casa oggi.

translation.en: Then I saw him in the pumpkin patch.
translation.it: Poi l'ho visto nel campo di zucche.

translation.en: His shirt was torn up. He was barking at the moon.
translation.it: Aveva la camicia strappata. Abbaiava alla luna.

translation.en: His arms were very, very hairy.
Then I saw him at this haunted house, his tail wagging in murderous glee.
translation.it: Poi l'ho visto in questa casa stregata, la coda scodinzolava di gioia omicida.

translation.en: -Wait, you talking about my dog, Buster. -That was Walter Lambert!
translation.it: - Stai parlando del mio cane, Buster. - Era Walter Lambert!

translation.en: Where does he live?
Fifty-Nine Elm Street. Check on it.
-There's your killer. -[man on phone] Salem PD.
Blake, I need you to go out to 59 Elm.
translation.it: - Polizia di Salem. - Blake, vai al 59 di Elm.

translation.en: There should be a guy there. New in town. Possibly shirtless.
translation.it: Dovrebbe esserci un uomo. Nuovo in città. Forse senza camicia.

translation.en: Yeah. Middle-aged, growls a lot, glue-on hairy hands?
translation.it: Sì. Di mezza età, ringhia molto, mani pelose incollate?

translation.en: Yeah, I got him right here. Him and your boy, Richie Hartman.
translation.it: Sì, ce l'ho qui. Lui e Richie Hartman.

translation.en: They both came by and turned themselves in, like, 45 minutes ago.
translation.it: Sono venuti a costituirsi 45 minuti fa.

translation.en: Together?
Yeah. Apparently, Lambert is Hartman's roommate at the mental hospital.
translation.it: Sì. Pare che Lambert sia il compagno di stanza di Hartman al manicomio.

translation.en: Sorry. Werewolf Treatment Center.
translation.it: Scusate. Al Centro di Cura Lupi Mannari.

translation.en: Lambert broke out about a month ago, and then Hartman broke out yesterday
translation.it: Lambert è fuggito circa un mese fa, Hartman ieri

translation.en: to try to find him and convince him to come back.
translation.it: per andare a cercarlo e convincerlo a rientrare.

translation.en: It's actually pretty sweet, isn't it?
So, you've had eyes on them for 45 minutes?
translation.it: Quindi li tieni d'occhio da 45 minuti?

translation.en: [Blake] Almost, like, an hour now.
And also, Lambert's real name is Nick Hudson. Yeah. Walter Lambert
translation.it: E il vero nome di Lambert è Nick Hudson. Sì. Walter Lambert

translation.en: is just some name that he got off a tombstone on his way into town.
translation.it: è un nome che ha preso da una lapide andando in città.

translation.en: All right, Blake. I got it. Thank you.
translation.it: Va bene, Blake. Ho capito. Grazie.

translation.en: I feel bad you got yourself in even more trouble just to save me.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che tu sia finito nei guai per salvarmi.

translation.en: No, it was good to get out of that place for a while.
translation.it: No, è stato bello uscire da quel posto per un po'.

translation.en: -You did me a favor. Thank you. -Did you do anything fun?
translation.it: - Mi hai fatto un favore. Grazie. - Hai fatto niente di divertente?

translation.en: I pissed on a tombstone, pissed on the street.
translation.it: Ho pisciato su una lapide, ho pisciato per strada.

translation.en: Just some fun pissing stuff, you know.
-Nobody pees more than you. -I'm peein' now.
translation.it: - Nessuno piscia più di te. - Sto pisciando ora.

translation.en: -That's a good roommate. Yes. [chuckles] -[sniffing, panting]
translation.it: Che bravo compagno di stanza. Sì.

translation.en: -Who's a good roommate? Yes. Yes. -[barking]
[Hartman chuckling] Yes, you are.
Lambert and Hartman have been in custody during the whole Landolfa disappearance.
translation.it: Lambert e Hartman erano in stato di fermo quando è scomparso Landolfa.

translation.en: So, it couldn't have been them.
-[dog whimpers] -Buster, my baby!
Oh, by the way, he ate a silver bullet if you wanna check his feces tomorrow.
translation.it: Ha mangiato un proiettile d'argento se vuoi controllargli le feci.

translation.en: I ain't doin' that.
Then who? Are there any clues?
Landolfa did go back into the haunted house to look for Hubie.
translation.it: Landolfa è tornato nella casa infestata a cercare Hubie.

translation.en: Yeah. Hubie seems to be around a lot of people before they go missing.
translation.it: Sì. Pare che Hubie sia sempre presente prima che le persone spariscano.

translation.en: -People who have messed with him. -Did the Hennesseys mess with Hubie, too?
translation.it: - Persone che lo hanno infastidito. - Anche gli Hennessey?

translation.en: Oh, they live for it.
So, it was payback time. Wasn't it, Hubie?
translation.it: Quindi ti sei vendicato. Vero, Hubie?

translation.en: No, I would never hurt anybody. I--
translation.it: No, non farei mai male a nessuno. Io…

translation.en: You got the wrong guy.
-Father Dave. -Have you been planning this all along?
translation.it: - Padre Dave. - Hai pianificato tutto questo?

translation.en: -[snarling] -You sick man.
-Have you? -I--
Have you?
Did we just fall for the old Frankenstein trick?
translation.it: Abbiamo abboccato al vecchio trucco di Frankenstein?

translation.en: -[Aurora] Bad news, gang. -[thunderclap]
WTCH has just learned
that Salem's Halloween is getting shut down.
translation.it: che Halloween a Salem verrà cancellato.

translation.en: [Aurora] The police department is advising everyone to stay home and lock doors.
translation.it: La polizia consiglia a tutti di chiudersi in casa.

translation.en: But, my little Halloweenies, we can all still celebrate
translation.it: Però, piccoli Halloweeniani, possiamo sempre festeggiare

translation.en: with nature's fireworks lighting up the night sky.
translation.it: con i fuochi naturali che illuminano il cielo notturno.

translation.en: Not sure what's happening in this creepy town,
translation.it: Non so cosa stia succedendo in questa città,

translation.en: but sounds like a good idea to cuddle up with someone special
translation.it: ma sembra una buona idea coccolarsi con qualcuno di speciale

translation.en: and enjoy the last half hour of Halloween under the covers.
translation.it: e godersi l'ultima mezz'ora di Halloween sotto le coperte.

translation.en: And just hope that whoever you cuddling isn't a madman.
translation.it: E spero che chiunque stiate coccolando non sia un pazzo.

translation.en: Well, looks like I have company.
So, we're going to take a word from our scary sponsors.
translation.it: Ok, ora una parola dai nostri spaventosi sponsor.

translation.en: -[whistles like theremin] -[man] W… T… C… H. -Aurora? -[gasps]
-[deep voice] Hubie Dubois. -Yes.
I'd recognize that voice anywhere. You look exactly how I pictured you.
translation.it: Riconoscerei quella voce ovunque. Sei proprio come ti immaginavo.

translation.en: To be honest with you, you don't look like the way I was picturing you.
translation.it: A essere sincero, tu non sei come ti immaginavo.

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] I guess my radio voice throws people off sometimes.
translation.it: Immagino che la mia voce radiofonica confonda la gente.

translation.en: Yeah, that-- I think that's it.
[deep voice] Have a seat, man.
What brings you all the way here this evenin'?
As you know, I'm a longtime listener, and I always respect the advice you give
translation.it: Come sai, ti ascolto da sempre e rispetto i consigli che dai

translation.en: to so many callers.
Right now, I'm in dire need of the most perspicacious advice
translation.it: In questo momento, ho un disperato bisogno del consiglio più perspicace

translation.en: -you have ever given to any other human-- -[knocking]
translation.it: che tu abbia mai dato ad altri…

translation.en: [Aurora gasps] Oh, my God. Isn't that so sweet? My wife brought snacks.
translation.it: Non è dolce? Mia moglie ha portato degli snack.

translation.en: [deep voice] Ooh! Hey, baby. How you doin'?
Oh, and who is this?
Baby, this is Hubie Dubois.
Whoa! For real?
Yes. Nice to meet you, ma'am.
I'm looking forward to hearing your real voice.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di sentire la sua vera voce.

translation.en: This is my real voice.
translation.it: Questa è la mia vera voce.

translation.en: Right. I know it is. I was just saying, you know…
translation.it: Giusto. Lo so. Stavo solo dicendo che…

translation.en: So, I am a big fan of your husband, Aurora.
translation.it: Sono un grande fan di suo marito, Aurora.

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
I feel like you're the second most frequent caller we get.
translation.it: Dicono che tu sia il secondo che chiama più spesso.

translation.en: -Besides that one lady. -Someone calls more than I do?
translation.it: - Dopo quella tipa. - Qualcuno chiama più di me?

translation.en: [laughs] Actually, I think she might have a little something for you, Hubie.
translation.it: In realtà, credo che provi qualcosa per te, Hubie.

translation.en: She always dedicates a song to a special someone.
translation.it: Dedica sempre una canzone a una persona speciale.

translation.en: And we all need that special someone.
translation.it: E tutti abbiamo bisogno di una persona speciale.

translation.en: -Right, baby? -Yes, we do. Oh!
Dig in.
-A couple days back… -Oh, man.
…she had a couple glasses of Chardonnay. Her guard was down,
translation.it: s'è fatta un paio di bicchieri di Chardonnay. Aveva abbassato la guardia,

translation.en: and she asked to dedicate a special song to Hubie.
translation.it: e ha chiesto di dedicare una canzone speciale a Hubie.

translation.en: -Chardonnay, eh? -You know what they say about Chardonnay?
translation.it: - Chardonnay, eh? - Sai cosa si dice dello Chardonnay?

translation.en: Truth serum. She said she's gonna show you how much she loves you on Halloween.
translation.it: Siero della verità. Ha detto che ti mostrerà quanto ti ama a Halloween.

translation.en: -Do you think we could trace the number? -I don't need to. Caller ID.
translation.it: - Possiamo risalire al numero? - Non serve. Ho l'identificativo.

translation.en: Sound familiar?
No. But there is a number that needs to be dialed immediately.
translation.it: No. Ma c'è un numero che deve essere chiamato immediatamente.

translation.en: It's a prepaid phone.
-[high-pitched voice] Bitch used a burner. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Ha usato un usa e getta.

translation.en: Any idea of someone who might have a thing for you, or…
translation.it: C'è qualcuno che potrebbe provare qualcosa per te o…

translation.en: How would somebody detect such a situation?
Anyone in town who seems like they might actually enjoy talking to you.
translation.it: Qualcuno in città che sembra possa trarre piacere nel parlare con te.

translation.en: There's one woman, but she's the nicest lady I ever met my life.
translation.it: Una c'è, ma è la donna più gentile che abbia mai conosciuto.

translation.en: Well, they all seem nice till they kill you.
What's the desperate sicko's name?
[whispers] The high school hat trick, Violet Valentine.
translation.it: La tripletta del liceo, Violet Valentine.

translation.en: Her? And you?
I mean…
All right. Let's go see if we can get ourselves a confession.
translation.it: Vediamo se riusciamo a strappare una confessione.

translation.en: Ooh! This is some Dateline NBC shit.
translation.it: Questa è roba da Dateline NBC.

translation.en: [Hubie] Stormhawk in position and petrified. Over.
All right. First of all, we're not gonna use code names.
translation.it: Ok. Prima di tutto, niente nomi in codice.

translation.en: -Okay? -[Hubie] Copy.
Did you send backup to my residence to have eyes on my mother? Over.
translation.it: Hai mandato rinforzi a casa mia per tenere d'occhio mia madre? Passo.

translation.en: I'm a little short-handed tonight,
translation.it: Sono un po' a corto di uomini,

translation.en: so I asked Father Dave to keep an eye on her.
translation.it: così ci ho mandato Padre Dave.

translation.en: Negative! Request armed units to that vicinity. Over.
translation.it: Negativo! Richiedi unità armate in quella zona. Passo.

translation.en: Sorry. I can't spare the manpower tonight.
Here she comes.
Okay, Hubie. It's showtime. Remember, we're lookin' for a confession.
translation.it: Ok, Hubie. Si balla. Ricorda, cerchiamo una confessione.

translation.en: But what if I can't get her to confess? Over.
translation.it: E se non riesco a farla confessare?

translation.en: If you feel like you've done all you can, or you feel like you're in danger,
translation.it: Se pensi di aver fatto tutto il possibile, o di essere in pericolo,

translation.en: say the code word. At that point, we'll call the burner phone.
translation.it: di' la parola in codice e chiameremo il telefono usa e getta.

translation.en: If she picks up, we can implicate her that way.
And what's the code word again? Over.
translation.it: E qual è la parola? Passo.

translation.en: -You don't have to say over. -[Hubie] Okay.
Code word is pumpkin.
Roger that. Bogey on my twelve.
Three on a match. Smoke 'em if you got 'em.
translation.it: Tre con un fiammifero. Fumale se ce l'hai.

translation.en: "Smoke 'em if you got--" What the hell is he talking about?
I don't know.
What'd you ask me out here for, Hubie?
translation.it: Perché mi hai fatto venire qui?

translation.en: What's up?
Pumpkin.
-Straight to pumpkin? -Yeah.
Pumpkin what?
Just pumpkin.
Don't kill me.
-You gotta be kiddin' me. -Dialing.
I would never hurt you.
translation.it: Non ti farei mai del male.

translation.en: Thank you. Pumpkin.
Now! Pumpkin.
-It's ringing. -Is this a prank?
Is there somebody watching us right now?
-No one can see us or hear us. -She must not have the phone on her.
translation.it: - Nessuno può vederci, né sentirci. - Non avrà il telefono.

translation.en: Hello?
I just wanted to tell you that I have been in love with you since second grade.

translation.en: -What? -Hello?
[whispers] Can you trace it now?
Hubie, I've been in love with you since the first grade.

translation.en: What took you so long?
I was in love with our teacher.
Miss Glennon?
-Wasn't she, like, 70? -I liked the way she smelled.
translation.it: - Non aveva tipo 70 anni? - Mi piaceva il suo odore.

translation.en: I can't believe this.
I can't believe that I spent three years with a self-confident-for-no-reason,
translation.it: Non posso credere di aver passato tre anni con un orco barbuto pieno di sé

translation.en: bearded, human-ogre when I could have been with you.
translation.it: senza motivo, quando avrei potuto essere con te.

translation.en: Ouch. That even hurt me.
I'm getting a location. Steve, look at this.

translation.en: -[Steve] Stormhawk, abort! -I thought you were out of my league.

translation.en: -Why? -Stormhawk, repeat, abort!
It's the best news I ever heard in my life.

translation.en: Abort. The killer's cell phone is in your house!

translation.en: Mama!
No! No way!
Lock your doors! Make sure you don't open them!

translation.en: Take care of your children! I'm gonna steal a boat!

translation.en: Mama!
I love you!
Oh, no. They got Father Dave.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Why aren't you watching my mother?

translation.en: The killer's in the house! The killer's in the house!
There's no one in the house but her.

translation.en: Can you help me down?
Ma! Ma!
You're okay.
Why, yes, Hubie. Why wouldn't I be?
So, um…
Am I your special someone, Mom?

translation.en: Always, Hubie.
And… today, did you--
did you try to show me just how much you love me?

translation.en: Why, yes, I did, Hubie. I truly did.
-[man 1] Hubie! -[woman 1] Hubie!
[man 1] Get us out of here! Help!
[Landolfa] Hubie, please, get us out of here!
Hubie, there's something wrong with your mom!

translation.en: Come on over here and let me punch your mom in the face!

translation.en: I mean, the good news is you're still alive. I was--
translation.it: La buona notizia è che siete ancora vivi.

translation.en: Nice observation, toolbox! Now get us out of this!
-I'm so sorry. -I tried to explain to you already, Hubie.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace tanto. - Ho già cercato di spiegarti, Hubie.

translation.en: If you don't fight back, the bullies never stop.

translation.en: So, I had to fight back for you.

translation.en: [Mike] Please, Hubie! Oh, my God!
Hubie, that's gas!
Mommy, I would've been satisfied if you put itching powder in their sleeping bag.

translation.en: This is extreme.
Don't do this to me. Hubie, I'll be your friend forever!

translation.en: [man] The old lady said they'd be in the backyard.
[Tracy] Roll it! Roll it!
You don't have to do this. This is too much.
We are here and we are live at an unfolding scene of Halloween horror.

-Mom, I really don't want you to do this. -I know, Hubie.
translation.it: - Non voglio che tu lo faccia. - Lo so.

translation.en: That's what makes you so wonderful. And that's why I have to do it.

translation.en: I have to make it good for you before I go.

translation.en: Before you go?
-To Heaven? -No. Probably going to Hell, Hubie.

translation.en: -Well, then I better do this now. -[Mr. Hennessy] My God. No, lady. Wait.

-Please don't. -[Landolfa] Hubie, stop her.

[echoing] No.
Always thinking of everyone else, never thinking of yourself.

[Landolfa] Just look at him!
He's so… Hubie!
Yes, he's Hubie.
He's helpful.
He's courteous, he's cheerful, he's considerate.
What a bad, bad man.
My great-great-great-great-great- grandmother laid down her life,
translation.it: La mia bis-bis-bis-bis-bisnonna ha dato la vita

translation.en: trying to save innocent people.
I was there.
And my son did her one better. He just saved four ungrateful jackasses.
translation.it: E mio figlio ha fatto di meglio. Ha salvato quattro stronzi ingrati.

translation.en: Thanks, Pubie.
Well, you can't even thank him without insulting him.

translation.en: I'm jealous of Hubie being able to be himself.

translation.it: Io ho perso i capelli 20 anni fa

translation.en: and every time I walk into a room, I feel silly.

translation.it: Perché uno come Hubie ha una chioma così folta e rigogliosa,

You're usually there. You know it's true.

Hubie hasn't had a lot of sex.

Hasn't had any sex.

I was diagnosed with dyslexia in the eighth grade.
translation.it: A me è stata diagnosticata la dislessia in terza media.

translation.en: I faked it for the doctors, but I'm really just dumb.
translation.it: L'ho finta per i dottori, ma in realtà sono solo scemo.

-No, I'm not surprised. -Nope.
-You surprised? -[laughs] No.

translation.en: It pisses me off.
Oh, 'cause of the dumb thing.
My brother-in-law once said that I had no ambition.

translation.en: And then he bit me, and I became a werewolf.
translation.it: Poi mi ha morso e sono diventato un licantropo.

translation.en: You see?
Hubie's smart, has nice hair, and sex hope.

translation.en: But to me,
his best quality is this.
translation.it: la sua qualità migliore è questa.

translation.en: He can weather all of your insults and your thrown objects,
translation.it: Sa resistere ai vostri insulti e agli oggetti che gli tirate

translation.en: and he responds with humor and-- and kindness.
translation.it: e reagisce con umorismo e gentilezza.

translation.en: Could you say the same?
Could any of you take the abuse you dish out to my Hubie?

translation.it: ha detto che è stato un onore essere arrestato da uno dei Muppet.

translation.en: You see, Hubie. True bravery's being kind.

translation.en: Even to those who are being cruel to you.

translation.en: I just always wanted to be as nice as you, Mom.

translation.en: Oh, you were nicer.
But now I know that you're ready to spread your wings and fly without me.

translation.en: You don't have to be scared anymore.
I'm feeling emotional.
-And a little horny. -Ooh!
-Not for you. -Oh.
Just know that I'll always love you.

translation.en: And happy Halloween.
[all] Where?
We fell for that twice in one night.
We gotta try that with the orderlies when we get back.
-Okay. -It's such a… [laughing]

I'm talking to you, Violet Valentine.
Also…

[Hubie] Yummy.
Can you guys stop kissing and check out our costumes?

translation.en: Yes, of course. Come on.
-Show us what you've got. -Please. Let's see it. Oh, my God.
translation.it: - Fateci vedere. - Vediamo. Oh, mio Dio.

Father Dave. My childhood friend, Richie Hartman.

-Our kids are so creative. -They are amazing. Mmm!

-Yeah, well… -Dad, don't forget your sash.

translation.en: Okay, yes. Would you put it on me, please? That's right.
Thank you, Danielle and everybody.
I'll see you at the apple-bobbing contest at ten o'clock tonight.

translation.en: You suck!
Sorry about that!
-Thanks, Dad. -Yeah, of course.
And this is chicken gumbo with a hair dryer.

translation.en: [sighs] Wow, that is badass.
All right, guys. Take care. I'll miss you.
-Mr. Mayor Dubois, let's get you downtown. -[car starts]

Bye! We love you. We'll see you later!

Hey, Hubie!
You're the man!
Thanks. I learned it all from my mother, who's right behind you.

translation.en: -[all gasp] -Got you, O'Doyle!
-[kids laugh] -Happy Halloween!
Happy Halloween to all! And to all, a good fright!

What are you?

-What are you? [screaming] -[clattering]

Freeze, Mrs. Dubois!

Smell--

Smell my feet.

[man] And… action!
